description: Process consisting of two worksheets (Gross Weigh Initiation and Gross Weigh Completion) to capture the gross and tare weights of a material container and calculate the net dispensed weight.
intent: To determine the net dispensed weight by recording the container’s gross weight before dispense and its tare weight after dispense.

inputs.ContainerID: Identifier of the container being weighed
inputs.GrossWeight: Weight of the container before dispensing (recorded in the Initiation worksheet)
inputs.TareWeight: Weight of the empty container after dispensing (recorded in the Completion worksheet)

outputs.NetWeight: Calculated difference between gross and tare weights
outputs.DispenseTransaction: Dispense transaction record sent during the Gross Weigh Completion phase

preconditions: Operator is on the Dispensing screen
side_effects: Dispense transactions are only transmitted during the Gross Weigh Completion phase
example_usage: Navigate to Dispensing → Gross Weigh Initiation, enter the gross weight and finish. Later navigate to Dispensing → Gross Weigh Completion, enter the tare weight and finish to calculate the net weight and send the dispense transaction.
